item.title: CVE-2020-12506|2024-09-17T00:06:46.518Z -- wago -- 750-362
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in WAGO 750-8XX series with FW version <= FW03 allows an attacker to change the settings of the devices by sending specifically constructed requests without authentication This issue affects: WAGO 750-362, WAGO 750-363, WAGO 750-823, WAGO 750-832/xxx-xxx, WAGO 750-862, WAGO 750-891, WAGO 750-890/xxx-xxx in versions FW03 and prior versions.
